item.title: Install CDH 5.13.0 on Ubuntu 16.04.2
item.description: Hosts IP Hostname 10.0.0.1 node1 10.0.0.2 node2 Disable IPv6 Edit /etc/sysctl.conf and add this values net.ipv6.conf.all.disable_ipv6 = 1 net.ipv6.conf.default.disable_ipv6 = 1 net.ipv6.conf.lo.disable_ipv6 = 1 Reload configuration sudo sysctl -p Configure hostnames Edit on ‘node1’ and ‘node2’ /etc/hosts. Add: 10.0.0.1 node1 10.0.0.1 node2 ### Install Java 8 sudo add-apt-repository ppa:webupd8team/java sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install oracle-java8-installer sudo apt-get install oracle-java8-set-default Install Cloudera MANAGER on ‘node1’ Run:
